text: Venkatraman "Venki" Ramakrishnan (born 1952) is an Indian-born-American- British structural biologist. He received the 2009 Nobel Prize in Chemistry together with Thomas A. Steitz and Ada E. Yonath for studies of the structure and function of the ribosome. He was born in Chidambaram, Tamil Nadu, India. == Related pages == *List of Nobel Prize winners in Chemistry == References == Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:American biochemists Category:American Nobel Prize winners Category:British biophysicists Category:British Nobel Prize winners Category:British biochemists Category:Indian Nobel Prize winners Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:People from Tamil Nadu
title: Venkatraman Ramakrishnan
